Always interesting when things like this happen... Here's what I've noticed on coinmarketcap.com
1. Price chart says 300% increase, witha price of $.028 ( when it was $.0008), so a 340% increase makes sense. HOWEVER the poloniex XRP/USDT still shows the original .0008 2. The Market capitalization on CMC jumped from 200m to 1 Billion. Talk about money injection. 3. In terms of volume and liquidity, Ripple Gateways XRP/USD has 4.8m VOL and only 1.5M on POLO XRP/BTC, when usually POLO is leading the pack.
Time should tell shortly.

Your going to be working the tills packing them or pushing buggies so don't hope for something overly fun. (Apply for front end) 4. They will likely hire in October and then your laid off Jan 1 until may. So you will only get half the months til school.
Good luck. ( I work at a surrounding one)

I enjoyed it even though it wasn't perfect because it had a catchy beat and a strong meaning. The message delivery reminded me of the likes of Immortal Technique. I'll take spitting the truth anytime over rapping about drugs and iPhones.

Simply put, you don't need to be a good mechanic to be a good driver. As Bitcoin grows, the industry needs to market the adoption to drivers in terms they understand. Almost everyone drives, and many are uninterested in what's under the hood, in this case the blockchain. They just want to get from A-B as fast and cheap as possible.
